author: eptwts
text:
i'm tired of putting up tweets every time i wanna hire talent for things such as:

- web development
- video editing
- software development
- copywriting
- design

my friends share the same issue - finding great talent is extremely hard

if you're cracked at any of these, drop your previous work in the replies of this tweet...

i will make a tg group chat with you, me & lots of people that are frequently hiring for these positions

i'm only inviting very talented people, no beginners please
